promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young rare elephant fighting-type with stone hooves. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or elephant. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Rockhoof, a chibi young rare elephant fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: karate-chop, brick-break. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word elephant or fighting or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, elephant-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Rockhoof is a plucky fighter who loves to roam canyons. Sage-like and swift, it practices kung fu to stay sharp.
